item.title: Best man: I’ve spent $4,400 on one wedding and can’t afford it anymore
Keurig Dr Pepper reportedly near $18B deal to buy coffee company JDE Peet's

GOP lawmakers push for tariffs tailored to help home-state firms
item.description: Sen. Bernie Moreno pressed Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick to expand steel tariffs to include steel-based products like washing machines and refrige...

item.title: The Federal Reserve could start resembling the Supreme Court
item.description: Fed governors typically step down before their terms expire, but they may stay on until a president from their political party is in the White House.

item.title: Dow eyes fresh highs as Nvidia gets set to report earnings amid AI bubble fears
item.description: Wall Street's faith in the staying power of AI as an investment thesis will be put to the test when Nvidia reports quarterly earnings on Wednesday.

item.title: Gen Zer who built multimillion-dollar companies says work-life balance is a trap and lists 5 ways to ‘optimize ruthlessly’ during your peak years
item.description: "When you front-load success early, you buy the luxury of choice for the rest of your life."

item.title: Credit fuels the AI boom — and fears of a bubble
item.description: “Private credit funding of artificial intelligence is running at around $50 billion a quarter, at the low end, for the past three quarters."
